item.name: For Programmer Dvorak Only
Make Cut, Copy, Paste, Quit and Undo behave same as on QWERTY
item.appendix: Change FN+Q to Command_L+X (X in DV - i.e. Cut)
Change FN+J to Command_L+C (C in DV - i.e. Copy)
Change FN+K to Command_L+V (V in DV - i.e. Paste)
Change FN+' to Command_L+Z (Z in DV - i.e. Undo)
Change FN+; to Command_L+Q (Q in DV - i.e. Quit)

item.name: Remap Left Control to Hyper
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps Left Control to Control + Shift + Option + Command.

item.name: Tap shift to move over words
item.appendix: Shift keys move the cursor one word forward or backward when pressed alone. When used with other keys they act as normal shifts.
